# Hello!!! 👋🏻 I'm Gabriel Santostefano
Full Stack Developer & Game Dev Enthusiast
## Web Development Skills
As part of my journey in web development, I have honed my skills in various technologies, including:
- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- Git
- NodeJS
- Express
- React
- Redux
- SQL
- Sequelize
